memberdef.name: sandbox_equivalent_specialization
memberdef.initializer: template<typename T_Sbx> \ struct Sbx_##libId##_##T \ { \ sandbox_fields_reflection_##libId##_class_##T( \ helper_create_converted_field, \ helper_no_op) \ }; \ \ /* add convert_to_sandbox_equivalent_t specialization for new struct */ \ namespace detail { \ template<typename T_Template, typename T_Sbx> \ struct convert_to_sandbox_equivalent_helper< \ T_Template, \ T_Sbx, \ std::enable_if_t<std::is_same_v<T_Template, T>>> \ { \ using type = Sbx_##libId##_##T<T_Sbx>; \ }; \ }

memberdef.name: tainted_data_specialization
memberdef.initializer: tainted_data_specialization_helper(, T, libId) \ tainted_data_specialization_helper(const, T, libId)

memberdef.name: rlbox_load_structs_from_library
memberdef.initializer: namespace rlbox { \ namespace detail { \ struct markerStruct \ {}; \ } \ /* check that this macro is called in a global namespace */ \ static_assert( \ ::rlbox::detail::is_member_of_rlbox_detail<detail::markerStruct>, \ "Invoke rlbox_load_structs_from_library in the global namespace"); \ \ sandbox_fields_reflection_##libId##_allClasses( \ sandbox_equivalent_specialization) \ \ sandbox_fields_reflection_##libId##_allClasses( \ tainted_data_specialization) \ \ sandbox_fields_reflection_##libId##_allClasses( \ convert_type_specialization) \ } \ RLBOX_REQUIRE_SEMI_COLON
